thread.title: Dannii Minogue attends BBC bash in slinky satin gown | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Dannii Minogue attends BBC bash in slinky satin gown | Daily Mail Online

author: Mail Online Reporter
title: Dannii Minogue attends BBC bash in slinky satin gown | Daily Mail Online
text: Buy now Stare-studded: Dannii joined a smattering of celebrities including Jennifer Saunders, Joanna Lumley and Matt Le Blanc at the BBC Worldwide's annual TV sales event showcase in Liverpool The pair, who played drunken duo Patsy and Edina in the BBC1 show, reunited for the special gala designed celebrate the show's global success. 'I'm delighted to see the huge international impact that Absolutely Fabulous is continuing to have, said writer and creator Jennifer. 'When I came up with the idea, never could I have imagined what a success it would be, let alone how long it would run for.' Nights in blue satin: Dannii has been enjoying a TV resurgence as one of the judges on Let It Shine The showcase will run for four days with various celebrities making presentations throughout the event. Along with Dannii, other stars appearing include Gary Barlow, Mel Giedroyc, Ed Westwick, Matt LeBlanc and Sherlock creators Steven Moffat and Mark Gatiss. Meanwhile, Dannii is preparing for next week's Let It Shine final in which bands Drive, Five To Five and Nightfall will compete in front of guest judge Robbie Williams to see who will star in the stage musical based on the songs of Take That Two of a kind: Jennifer Saunders donned an extortionate amount of under-eye concealer as she joined Absolutely Fabulous co-star Joanna Lumley at the event Share or comment on this article 83
